channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Pathway blocked by gate, 29th December
item.description:
The definitive map on the council website shows that the footpath begins on badgeworth road and goes down the driveway of Reddings Farm. On 28/12/2025 the driveway was obstructed by a gate, with cows behind it covering the path. This looks to be a temporary arrangement but there was no clear or safe alternative route. I think the landowner needs to ensure a clearly signposted and safe way around when this gate is in position, or stop using the gate entirely if an alternative isn't possible, as the definitive path is by the strict definition, being illegally obstructed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Badgeworth Road, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked Drain, 29th December
item.description:
The drain close to the bus stop just after Tennyson Road in Benhall (going into Cheltenham) is blocked. It’s been this way for a few days that I’m aware of.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 418, Gloucester Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
